languages.text: 当装备者在战斗中受到创伤效果影响时，如果装备者的生命值高于0，则立即恢复{uip|Heal|3e54949b6a89465fa52cd37fb7fa7889}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。 基础护甲特性：如果装备者的武器技能高于55，获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer suffers a trauma in combat, if they have more than 0 wounds, they immediately regain +{uip|Heal|3e54949b6a89465fa52cd37fb7fa7889} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer's Weapon Skill is more than 55.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者在战斗中受到创伤效果影响时，如果装备者的生命值高于0，则立即恢复（{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}/4）点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。 基础护甲特性：如果装备者的武器技能高于55，获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}。
当装备者在战斗中受到创伤效果影响时，如果装备者的生命值高于0，则立即恢复{uip|Heal|3e54949b6a89465fa52cd37fb7fa7889}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。 基础护甲特性：如果装备者的武器技能高于55，获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}。

languages.text: Lorsque le porteur subit un traumatisme au combat, s'il lui reste plus de 0 blessure, il regagne immédiatement +{uip|Heal|3e54949b6a89465fa52cd37fb7fa7889} points de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base: +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} si la Capacité de combat du porteur est supérieure à 55.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, çatışmada bir travmaya maruz kaldığında 0'dan fazla sağlık puanına sahipse +{uip|Heal|3e54949b6a89465fa52cd37fb7fa7889} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanını anında geri kazanır. Taban zırh özelliği: Giyen kişinin Silah Yeteneği niteliği 55'ten yüksekse +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}.
